short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website URL to Barcode & Shorten URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is very useful and time saving add-on. You can simply click on the add-on icon to generate the barcode. Then use any barcode scanner device to scan and the website URL will be opened.
